name: Tainted Grail: Conquest + Original Soundtrack Bundle
name_original: Tainted Grail: Conquest + Original Soundtrack Bundle
description:
Tainted Grail: Conquest + Original Soundtrack Bundle includes:

  • Tainted Grail: Conquest
  • Tainted Grail: Conquest - Soundtrack


If you have bought Tainted Grail: Conquest before 11th February 2021, then a free copy of Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon will be automatically added to your library.
